}\n        });\n      }\n    },\n    lastPage: function lastPage() {\n      if (this.nowPage > 1) {\n        this.nowPage--;\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true;\n        this.updateResources();\n      }\n    },\n    nextPage: function nextPage() {\n      if (this.nowPage < this.pageLength) {\n        this.nowPage++;\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true;\n        this.updateResources();\n      }\n    },\n    jumpPage: function jumpPage() {\n      var userPageNum = parseInt(this.userPage);\n      if (isNaN(userPageNum)) {\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！');\n      } else if (userPageNum < 1 || userPageNum > this.pageLength) {\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！');\n      } else {\n        this.nowPage = userPageNum;\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true;\n        this.updateResources();\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  created: function created() {\n    var ss = this;\n    var post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_10__general_getUrl_js__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, 'POST',\n      async: false,\n      data: { 'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id },\n      success: function success(data) {\n        ss.course = data['course_info']['name'];\n        ss.$store.state.course_code = data['course_info']['course_code'];\n      },\n      error: function error() {\n        alert('fail');\n      }\n    });\n    post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_10__general_getUrl_js__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/id/list/');\n    __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_9_jquery___default.a.ajax({\n    success: function success(data) {\n        ss.resourcesIdList = data['resource_id_list'];\n        ss.nowPage = 0;\n        ss.pageLength = Math.ceil(ss.resourcesIdList.length / 9);\n        if strict\";\n//\n//\n//\n//\n//\n//\n//\n\n__webpack_require__(\"4qOc\");\n__webpack_require__(\"+cgv\");\n__webpack_require__(\"3f40\");\nif (!window.Quill) {\n  window.Quill = __webpack_require__(\"yPE/\");\n}\n/* harmony default export */ __webpack_exports__[\"a\"] = ({\n  name: 'quill-editor',\n  data: function data() {\n    return {\n      _content: '',\n      defaultModules: {\n        toolbar: [['bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike'], ['blockquote', 'code-block'], [{ 'header': 1 }, { 'header': 2 }], [{ 'list': 'ordered' }, { 'list': 'bullet' }], [{ 'script': 'sub' }, { 'script': 'super' }], [{ 'indent': '-1' }, { 'indent': '+1' }], [{ 'direction': 'rtl' }], [{ 'size': ['small', false, 'large', 'huge'] }], [{ 'header': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, false] }], [{ 'color': [] }, { 'background': [] }], [{ 'font': [] }], [{ 'align': [] }], ['clean'], ['link', 'image', 'video']]\n      }\n    };\n  },\n  props: {\n    content: String,\n    value: String,\n    disabled: Boolean,\n    options: {\n      type: Object,\n      required: false,\n      default: function _default() {\n        return {};\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  mounted: function mounted() {\n    this.initialize();\n  },\n  beforeDestroy: function beforeDestroy() {\n    this.quill = null;\n  },\n  methods: {\n    initialize: function initialize() {\n      if (this.$el) {\n\n        // options and instance\n        var self = this;\n        self.options.theme = self.options.theme || 'snow';\n        self.options.boundary = self.options.boundary || document.body;\n        self.options.modules = self.options.modules || self.defaultModules;\n        self.options.modules.toolbar = self.options.modules.toolbar !== undefined ? self.options.modules.toolbar : self.defaultModules.toolbar;\n        self.options.placeholder = self.options.placeholder || 'Insert text here ...';\n        self.options.readOnly = self.options.readOnly !== undefined ? self.options.readOnly : false;\n        self.quill = new Quill(self.$refs.editor, self.options);\n\n        // set editor content\n        if (self.value || self.content) {\n          self.quill.pasteHTML(self.value || self.content);\n        }\n\n        // mark model as touched if editor lost focus\n        self.quill.on('selection-change', function (range) {\n          if (!range) {\n            self.$emit('blur', self.quill);\n          } else {\n            self.$emit('focus', self.quill);\n          }\n        });\n\n        // update model if text changes\n        self.quill.on('text-change', function (delta, oldDelta, source) {\n          var html = self.$refs.editor.children[0].innerHTML;\n          var text = self.quill.getText();\n          if (html === '<p><br></p>') html = '';\n          self._content = html;\n          self.$emit('input', self._content);\n          self.$emit('change', {\n            editor: self.quill,\n            html: html,\n            text: text\n          });\n        });\n\n        // disabled\n        if (this.disabled) {\n          this.quill.enable(false);\n        }\n\n        // emit ready\n        self.$emit('ready', self.quill);\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  watch: {\n    content: function content(newVal, oldVal) {\n      if (this.quill) {\n        if (!!newVal && newVal !== this._content) {\n          this._content = newVal;\n          this.quill.pasteHTML(newVal);\n        } else if (!newVal) {\n          this.quill.setText('');\n        }\n      }\n    },\n    value: function value(newVal, oldVal) {\n      if (this.quill) {\n        if (!!newVal && newVal !== this._content) {\n          this._content = newVal;\n          this.quill.pasteHTML(newVal);\n        } else if (!newVal) {\n          this.quill.setText('');\n        }\n      }\n    },\n    disabled: function disabled(newVal, oldVal) {\n      if (this.quill) {\n        this.quill.enable(!newVal);\n      }\n    }\n  }\n});\n\n/***/ }),\n\n/***/ \"VTBF\":\n/***/ (function(module, exports) {\n\n// removed by extract-text-webpack-plugin\n\n/***/ }),\n\n/***/ \"X6ah\":\n/***/ (function(module, __webpack_exports__, check_username(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        value = value.toLowerCase();\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-z0-9_]{1,20}$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('用户名格式错误'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_nickname = function check_nickname(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('昵称不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var l = value.length;\n        var rl = 0;\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\n            rl++;\n          }\n          rl++;\n        }\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_gender = function check_gender(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('性别不能为空'));\n      }\n      callback();\n    };\n    var check_password = function check_password(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^.{8,20}$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('密码长度必须在8-20位'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_confirmed_password = function check_confirmed_password(rule, value, callback) {\n Error('邮箱不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@buaa.edu.cn$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else eslint-disable brace-style */\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\n\n\n\n/* harmony default export */ __webpack_exports__[\"a\"] = ({\n  name: 'personal',\n  data: function data() {\n    var check_nickname = function check_nickname(rule, value, callback) {\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var l = value.length;\n        var rl = 0;\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\n            rl++;\n          }\n          rl++;\n        }\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_intro = function check_intro(rule, value, callback) {\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var l = value.length;\n        var rl = 0;\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\n            rl++;\n          }\n          rl++;\n        }\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 50) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('自我介绍长度必须在50位及以下'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n\n    return {\n      spaceName: this.username + xindetai\r\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl'\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'Course',\r\n  components: { Header },\r\n  data () {\r\n    return {\r\n      tree_data:                   { label: '公共必修课' },\r\n                   { label: '公共选修课' }]\r\n      },\r\n      {\r\n        label: '开设院系',\r\n        children: [{ label: '1系' },\r\n                   { label: },\r\n                   { label: '25系' },\r\n                   { label: '26系' },\r\n                   { label: '27系' },\r\n                   { label: '28系' },\r\n                   { label: '29系' },\r\n                   { label: '56系' },\r\n                   { label: '91系' }\r\n        ]\r\n      }],\r\n      filters: {\r\n        name: ''\r\n      },\r\n      total: 0, // total courses\r\n this.$router.push({ path: ('/course/page/' + this.courses[index]['course_id'] + '/') })\r\n    },\r\n    handle_current_change (value) {\r\n      this.current_page = value\r\n      this.courses = []\r\n      var len = this.storage.length < value*this.page_size ? this.storage.length % this.page_size : this.page_size\r\n\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {\r\n        this.courses.push(this.storage[(value-1)*this.page_size+i])\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    course_tree_clicked (data, node) {\r\n      // todo: use api to get the corresponding courses\r\n      if (typeof (node.parent.label) !== 'undefined') {\r\n        this.course_bread_message = node.parent.label + '->' + node.label\r\n        this.load_courses = true\r\n        var self = this\r\n        if (node.parent.label === '开设院系') {\r\n          var temp1 = { 'college_id': node.label.substr(0, node.label.length-1) }\r\n          var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/college_course/')\r\n          $.ajax({\r\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n            dataType: 'json',\r\n            type: 'POST',\r\n            url: post_url,\r\n            data: temp1,\r\n            async: false,\r\n            success: function (data) {\r\n              // 初始化storage和courses以及当前页数\r\n              var info_list = data['course_info_list']\r\n              self.storage = []\r\n              self.total = info_list.length\r\n              for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\r\n                var item = {\r\n                  'course_name': info_list[i]['name'],\r\n                  'course_id': info_list[i]['id'],\r\n                  'course_academy': info_list[i]['college_id'],\r\n                  'course_hours': info_list[i]['hours'],\r\n                  'course_credit': info_list[i]['credit'],\r\n                  'course_class': self.course_class_dict[info_list[i]['class_id'] - 1]\r\n                }\r\n                self.storage.push(item)\r\n              }\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              alert('拉取信息失败!')\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n          self.handle_current_change(1)\r\n          self.load_courses = false\r\n        }\r\n        else if (node.parent.label === '课程类别') {\r\n          this.$message({\r\n            showClose: true,\r\n            message: '课程类别暂未开放，敬请期待，当前可以使用搜索或者开设院系来查找课程~'\r\n          })\r\n          /*\r\n          var temp2 = { 'class_id': '' }\r\n          switch (node.label) {\r\n            case this.course_bread_message = node.label\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    search_course_clicked () {\r\n      if (!this.filters.name) {\r\n        this.$message.error({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '搜索内容不能为空!'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n      else {\r\n        this.load_courses = true\r\n        this.course_bread_message = this.filters.name\r\n        var post_data = {\r\n          'keyword': this.filters.name\r\n        }\r\n        var self = this\r\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/searching/')\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: post_data,\r\n          async: false,\r\n          success: function (data) {\r\n            self.total = data['query_list'].length\r\n            self.storage = []\r\n            for (var i = 0; i < data['query_list'].length; i++) {\r\n              var course = data['query_list'][i]\r\n              self.storage.push({\r\n                'course_name': course['name'],\r\n                'course_id': course['id'],\r\n                'course_academy': course['college_id'],\r\n                'course_hours': course['hours'],\r\n                'course_credit': course['credit'],\r\n                'course_class': course['class_id']\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            alert('连接服务器异常')\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n        self.handle_current_change(1)\r\n        self.load_courses = false\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    add_course_clicked () {\r\n      // todo: add course function\r\n      this.$message({\r\n        showClose: true,\r\n        message: '功能暂未开放，敬请期待'\r\n      })\r\n </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:5px 0px 0px 0px;height:1px;background-color:black;\"></el-row>\r\n        </el-row>        \r\n        </el-col>         \r\n\r\n        <el-col :span=\"6\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n          <el-row v-for=\"item in resourcesData\" v-if=\"item.col2\" class=\"hoverChange\"  @click.native=\"openDialog(item.id)\">\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\" >\r\n            <el-col :span=\"8\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <img :src=item.img style=\"height:100px;\"></img>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <el-row class=\"resourceTitle\">\r\n                <p>{{ item.name }}</p>\r\n              </el-row>\r\n              <el-row class=\"resourceIntro\">\r\n                <span>{{ item.intro }}</span>\r\n              </el-row>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row  style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\">\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-star-off\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.collections }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-arrow-down\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.downloads }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-message\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.messages }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"5\">\r\n              <img :src='defaultImg' style=\"height:18px;\"></img>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <a href=\"\">{{ item.author }}</a>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;\">\r\n            <el-col :span=\"18\" :offset=\"6\" style=\"color:#d3d3d3;\">\r\n              上传时间:{{ item.time }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:5px 0px 0px 0px;height:1px;background-color:black;\"></el-row>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n        <el-col :span=\"6\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n          <el-row v-for=\"item in resourcesData\" v-if=\"item.col3\" class=\"hoverChange\" @click.native=\"openDialog(item.id)\">\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\" >\r\n            <el-col :span=\"8\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <img :src=item.img style=\"height:100px;\"></img>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <el-row class=\"resourceTitle\">\r\n                <p>{{ item.name }}</p>\r\n              </el-row>\r\n              <el-row class=\"resourceIntro\">\r\n                <span>{{ item.intro }}</span>\r\n              </el-row>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row  style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\">\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-star-off\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.collections }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-arrow-down\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.downloads }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <i class=\"el-icon-message\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.messages }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"5\">\r\n              <img :src='defaultImg' style=\"height:18px;\"></img>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n              <a href=\"\">{{ item.author }}</a>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;\">\r\n            <el-col :span=\"18\" :offset=\"6\" style=\"color:#d3d3d3;\">\r\n              上传时间:{{ item.time }}\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"margin:5px 0px 0px 0px;height:1px;background-color:black;\"></el-row>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n      </el-row>\r\n      <!-- 分页按钮 -->\r\n      <el-row>\r\n        <el-col :span=\"1\" :offset=\"16\" style=\"color:red;height:28px;line-height:28px;\"><label v-if=\"jumpHintVisible\">跳转中</label></el-col>\r\n        <el-col :span=\"2\">\r\n          <el-button-group>\r\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" size=\"small\" @click.native=\"lastPage\"><i class=\"el-icon-arrow-left\"></i></el-button>\r\n            <el-button type=\"default\" size=\"small\">{{ nowPage }} / {{ pageLength }}</el-button>\r\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" size=\"small\" @click.native=\"nextPage\"><i class=\"el-icon-arrow-right\"></i></el-button>\r\n          </el-button-group>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n        <el-col :span=\"3\">\r\n          <label>跳转到</label>\r\n          <el-input v-model=\"userPage\" style=\"width:50px;\"  size=\"small\" />\r\n          <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"jumpPage\" size=\"small\">跳转</el-button>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n      </el-row>\r\n\r\n    </el-row>\r\n\r\n    <!-- 资源详细信息窗口 -->\r\n    <el-dialog title=\"资源信息\" :visible.sync=\"dialogVisible\" v-if=\"dialogVisible\" size=\"tiny\">\r\n      <ResourceDialog></ResourceDialog>\r\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\r\n        <el-button @click=\"dialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"dialogVisible = false\">确 定</el-button>\r\n      </span>\r\n    </el-dialog>\r\n\r\n    <el-dialog title=\"上传资源\" :visible.sync=\"uploadDialogVisible\" size=\"tiny\">\r\n      <el-form label-position=\"left\">\r\n        <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"资源介绍\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\r\n          <el-input v-model=\"resourceIntro\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"请输入资源介绍\"></el-input>\r\n        </el-form-item>\r\n        <el-form-item :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\r\n          <input type=\"file\" value=\"\" id=\"file\">\r\n        </el-form-item>     \r\n      </el-form>  \r\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\r\n        <el-button @click=\"uploadDialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"upload\">上 传</el-button>\r\n      </span>      \r\n    </el-dialog>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n\r\n<script>\r\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\r\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\r\nimport ResourceDialog from '../general/ResourceDialog'\r\nimport DefaultImg from './../../assets/fileico/generic.png'\r\nimport DocImg from './../../assets/fileico/docx_win.png'\r\nimport PdfImg from './../../assets/fileico/pdf.png'\r\nimport PptImg from './../../assets/fileico/pptx.png'\r\nimport JpgImg from './../../assets/fileico/jpeg.png'\r\nimport ZipImg from './../../assets/fileico/zip.png'\r\nimport RarImg from './../../assets/fileico/rar.png'\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'resource',\r\n  components: { Header, ResourceDialog },\r\n  data () {\r\n    return {\r\n      uploadDialogVisible: false,\r\n      dialogVisible: false,\r\n      course: '软件工程基础',\r\n      options: [\r\n        {\r\n          value: '选项1',\r\n          label: '按上传时间排序'\r\n        }, {\r\n          value: '选项2',\r\n          label: '按文件类型排序'\r\n        }, {\r\n          value: '选项3',\r\n          label: '按好评度排序'\r\n        }\r\n      ],\r\n      sortMode: '按上传时间排序',\r\n      zipImg: ZipImg,\r\n      pdfImg: PdfImg,\r\n      pptImg: PptImg,\r\n      docImg: DocImg,\r\n      jpgImg: JpgImg,\r\n      rarImg: RarImg,\r\n      defaultImg: DefaultImg,\r\n      resourcesData: [],\r\n      resourcesIdList: [],\r\n      fileList: [],\r\n      resourceIntro: '',\r\n      nowPage: 1,\r\n      pageLength: 0,\r\n      userPage: '',\r\n      jumpHintVisible: false\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  beforeCreate: function () {\r\n\r\n  },\r\n  methods: {\r\n    closed: function () { alert('还未开放') },\r\n    return_course_info_page_clicked () {\r\n      this.$router.push({ path: ('/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/') })\r\n    },\r\n    openDialog: function (id) {\r\n      this.$store.state.id = id\r\n      var resourceDialogSelf = this\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\r\n      var _this = this\r\n      $.ajax({\r\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n        dataType: 'json',\r\n        url: post_url,\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        async: false,\r\n        data: {'resource_id': id},\r\n        success: function (rdata) {\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.name = rdata['resource_info']['name']\r\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\r\n          $.ajax({\r\n            url: post_url,\r\n            type: 'POST',\r\n            data: {id: rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']},\r\n            async: false,\r\n            success: function (data) {\r\n              data = JSON.parse(data)\r\n              resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = data['user_info']['username']\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              alert('fail')\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n          // resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = rdata['user_info']['username']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.size = rdata['resource_info']['size']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.time = rdata['resource_info']['upload_time']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.intro = rdata['resource_info']['intro']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.url = rdata['resource_info']['url']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.download_count = rdata['resource_info']['download_count']\r\n          resourceDialogSelf.dialogVisible = true\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n          alert('fail')\r\n        }\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    upload: function () {\r\n      var formData = new FormData()\r\n      var fileObj = document.getElementById('file').files[0]\r\n      formData.append('file', fileObj)\r\n      formData.append('name', fileObj.name)\r\n      formData.append('only_url', false)\r\n      formData.append('url', null)\r\n      formData.append('intro', this.resourceIntro)\r\n      formData.append('course_code', this.$store.state.course_code)\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resourceUpload/')\r\n      $.ajax({\r\n        url: post_url,\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        data: formData,\r\n        async: true,\r\n        cache: false,\r\n        contentType: false,\r\n        processData: false,\r\n        success: function (rdata) {\r\n          rdata = JSON.parse(rdata)\r\n          if (rdata['error'] === 0) {\r\n            alert('上传文件成功！')\r\n          } else {\r\n            alert('上传失败！' + rdata['error'])\r\n          }\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n          alert('fail')\r\n        }\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    updateResources: function () {\r\n      var ss = this\r\n      var ti = 0\r\n      let resourceSelf = []\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\r\n      var _this = this\r\n      if (this.pageLength === 0) {\r\n        ss.jumpHintVisible = false\r\n        return\r\n      }\r\n      for (var i = (ss.nowPage - 1) * 9; i < ss.resourcesIdList.length && i < ss.nowPage * 9; i++) {\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: {'resource_id': ss.resourcesIdList[i]},\r\n          success: function (rdata) {\r\n            var tt = {\r\n              col1: false,\r\n              col2: false,\r\n              col3: false,\r\n              name: '全部课件.zip',\r\n              intro: '里面整合了1~13章课件，全部是pdf格式',\r\n              collections: 0,\r\n              downloads: 56,\r\n              messages: 0,\r\n              author: '果冻',\r\n              time: '2017-3-26',\r\n              id: 0,\r\n              img: ''\r\n            }\r\n            if (ti % 3 === 0) {\r\n              tt.col1 = true\r\n            }\r\n            if (ti % 3 === 1) {\r\n              tt.col2 = true\r\n            }\r\n            if (ti % 3 === 2) {\r\n              tt.col3 = true\r\n            }\r\n            ti++\r\n            tt.name = rdata['resource_info']['name']\r\n            tt.intro = rdata['resource_info']['intro']\r\n            tt.downloads = rdata['resource_info']['download_count']\r\n            post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\r\n            $.ajax({\r\n              url: post_url,\r\n              type: 'POST',\r\n              data: {id: rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']},\r\n              async: false,\r\n              success: function (data) {\r\n                data = JSON.parse(data)\r\n                tt.author = data['user_info']['username']\r\n              },\r\n              error: function () {\r\n                alert('fail')\r\n              }\r\n            })\r\n            tt.time = rdata['resource_info']['upload_time']\r\n            tt.id = rdata['resource_info']['id']\r\n            tt.img = ss.defaultImg\r\n            var tL = tt.name.length\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'd' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'o' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'c') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.docImg\r\n            }\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'd' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'f') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.pdfImg\r\n            }\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 't') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.pptImg\r\n            }\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'z' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'i' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'p') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.zipImg\r\n            }\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'j' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'g') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.jpgImg\r\n            }\r\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'r' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'a' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'r') {\r\n              tt.img = ss.rarImg\r\n            }\r\n            resourceSelf.push(tt)\r\n            ss.resourcesData = resourceSelf\r\n            ss.jumpHintVisible = false\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            alert('fail')\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    lastPage: function () {\r\n      if (this.nowPage > 1) {\r\n        this.nowPage--\r\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\r\n        this.updateResources()\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    nextPage: function () {\r\n      if (this.nowPage < this.pageLength) {\r\n        this.nowPage++\r\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\r\n        this.updateResources()\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    jumpPage: function () {\r\n      var userPageNum = parseInt(this.userPage)\r\n      if (isNaN(userPageNum)) {\r\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！')\r\n      } else if (userPageNum < 1 || userPageNum > this.pageLength) {\r\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！')\r\n      } else {\r\n        this.nowPage = userPageNum\r\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\r\n        this.updateResources()\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  created: function () {\r\n    var ss = this\r\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      async: false,\r\n      data: {'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id},\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        ss.course = data['course_info']['name']\r\n        ss.$store.state.course_code = data['course_info']['course_code']\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('fail')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/id/list/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      async: false,\r\n      data: {'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id},\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        ss.resourcesIdList = data['resource_id_list']\r\n        ss.nowPage = 0\r\n        ss.pageLength = Math.ceil(ss.resourcesIdList.length / 9)\r\n        if (ss.pageLength !== 0) {\r\n          ss.nowPage = 1\r\n        }\r\n        ss.updateResources()\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('fail')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n\r\n<style scpoed>\r\n  #resourceTitle {\r\n    font-size: 25px;\r\n    font-weight: bold;\r\n    height: 100px;\r\n    line-height: 60px;\r\n  }\r\n  .resourceIntro {\r\n    margin: 10px 0px 0px 0px;\r\n    word-break: break-all;\r\n    word-wrap: break-word;\r\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\r\n  }\r\n  .hoverChange:hover {\r\n    background-color:#7fffd4;\r\n  }\r\n  #dialogTitle {\r\n    height: 30px;\r\n    line-height: 30px;\r\n    font-size: 25px;\r\n    font-weight: bold;\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n  }\r\n FOOTER //\n// src/components/course/resource.vue","<template>\r\n  <div id=\"app\">\r\n    <Header></Header>\r\n    <Carousel></Carousel>\r\n    <Footer></Footer>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\r\nimport Header from './general/Header'\r\nimport Carousel from './general/Carousel'\r\nimport Footer from './general/Footer'\r\nexport },\r\n  methods: {\r\n    gotoDownload: function () {\r\n      var sh = this\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/download_count/')\r\n   data: { 'download_count': sh.$store.state.id },\r\n        success: function (data) {\r\n          sh.$store.state.id = data['download_count']\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n })\r\n          } else {\r\n            _this.$message({\r\n              showClose: true,\r\n              type: 'error',\r\n              message: '评分失败了呢'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n })\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  created: function () {\r\n    this.img = this.defaultImg\r\n    let tL = this.$store.state.name.length\r\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'd' && }\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    mounted: function() {\r\n      this.initialize()\r\n    },\r\n    beforeDestroy: function() {\r\n      this.quill = null\r\n    },\r\n    methods: {\r\n      initialize: self.options.boundary = self.options.boundary || document.body\r\n          self.options.modules = self.options.modules || self.defaultModules\r\n          self.options.modules.toolbar = self.options.modules.toolbar !== undefined \r\n                                          ? self.options.modules.toolbar \r\n                                          : self.defaultModules.toolbar\r\n          self.options.placeholder = self.options.placeholder || 'Insert text here ...'\r\n          self.options.readOnly = self.options.readOnly !== undefined ? self.options.readOnly : false\r\n          self.quill = new Quill(self.$refs.editor, self.options)\r\n\r\n          // set editor content\r\n          if (self.value || self.content) {\r\n            self.quill.pasteHTML(self.value || self.content)\r\n          }\r\n\r\n          // mark model as touched if editor lost focus\r\n          self.quill.on('selection-change', (range) => {\r\n            if (!range) {\r\n              self.$emit('blur', self.quill)\r\n            } else {\r\n              self.$emit('focus', self.quill)\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n\r\n          // update model if text changes\r\n          self.quill.on('text-change', (delta, oldDelta, source) => {\r\n            var html = self.$refs.editor.children[0].innerHTML\r\n            var text = self.quill.getText()\r\n            if (html === '<p><br></p>') html = ''\r\n            self._content = html\r\n            self.$emit('input', self._content)\r\n            self.$emit('change', {\r\n              editor: self.quill,\r\n              html: html,\r\n              text: text\r\n            })\r\n          })\r\n\r\n          // disabled\r\n          if (this.disabled) {\r\n            this.quill.enable(false)\r\n          }\r\n\r\n          // emit ready\r\n          self.$emit('ready', self.quill)\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    watch: {\r\n      content: function(newVal, oldVal) {\r\n        if (this.quill) {\r\n          if (!!newVal && newVal !== this._content) {\r\n            this._content = newVal\r\n            this.quill.pasteHTML(newVal)\r\n          } else if(!newVal) {\r\n            this.quill.setText('')\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      },\r\n      value: function(newVal, oldVal) {\r\n        if (this.quill) {\r\n          if (!!newVal && newVal !== this._content) {\r\n            this._content = newVal\r\n            this.quill.pasteHTML(newVal)\r\n          } else if(!newVal) {\r\n            this.quill.setText('')\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      },\r\n      disabled: function(newVal, oldVal) {\r\n        if (this.quill) {\r\n          this.quill.enable(!newVal)\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n</script>\r\n\r\n<style>\r\n  .quill-editor img </el-form-item>\r\n      <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"昵称\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\" prop=\"nickname\" id=\"register_form2\">\r\n        <el-input v-model=\"register_form.nickname\"      <el-input type=\"password\" v-model=\"register_form.password\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"8-20位,大小写敏感\"></el-input>\r\n      </el-form-item>\r\n      <el-form-item label=\"确认密码\" <el-input v-model=\"register_form.email\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"合法的北航邮箱\"></el-input>\r\n      </el-form-item>\r\n    </el-form>\r\n      <span slot=\"footer\" @click.native=\"register_form_visible=false\">取 消</el-button>\r\n      </span>\r\n  </el-dialog>\r\n</div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n<script>\r\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\r\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\n// 请不要删除和geturl相关的行，直接把data中的dev更改成false就可以。by xindetai 12/3\r\nimport get_url from './getUrl.js'\r\n// import json from 'json5'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'Header',\r\n  beforeCreate: function () {\r\n    var self = this\r\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/logged_in/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        self.username = data['username']\r\n        if (self.username == null) {\r\n          self.is_login = false\r\n          self.$store.state.is_login = false\r\n          self.$store.state.user_name = ''\r\n        } else {\r\n          self.is_login = true\r\n          self.$store.state.is_login = true\r\n          self.$store.state.user_name = self.username\r\n        }\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('加载导航栏连接服务器失败')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/iprecord/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('ip记录链接失败')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n  },\r\n  data () {\r\n    var username_check_empty = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      callback()\r\n      // setTimeout(() => {  }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var password_check_empty = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      callback()\r\n      // setTimeout(() => { callback() }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_username = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        value = value.toLowerCase()\r\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-z0-9_]{1,20}$/)\r\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('用户名格式错误'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_nickname = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('昵称不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        var l = value.length\r\n        var rl = 0\r\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\r\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\r\n            rl++\r\n          }\r\n          rl++\r\n        }\r\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_gender = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('性别不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      callback()\r\n    }\r\n    var check_password = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^.{8,20}$/)\r\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('密码长度必须在8-20位'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_confirmed_password = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('请再次输入密码'))\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        if (value === this.register_form.password) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('两次输入密码不一致'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_email = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      if (!value) {\r\n        callback(new Error('邮箱不能为空'))\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@buaa.edu.cn$/)\r\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('非法邮箱，邮箱必须是北航邮箱'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    return {\r\n      logo_name: 'BUAA-iCourse',\r\n      is_login: false,\r\n      login_form_visible: false,\r\n      register_form_visible: false,\r\n      form_label_width: '80px',\r\n      username: '',\r\n      dev: true,\r\n      login_form: {\r\n        username: '',\r\n        password: ''\r\n      },\r\n      register_form: {\r\n        username: '',\r\n        nickname: '',\r\n        gender: '',\r\n        password: '',\r\n        confirmed_password: '',\r\n        email: ''\r\n      },\r\n      gender_options: [{\r\n        value: '1',\r\n        label: '男'\r\n      }, {\r\n        value: '2',\r\n        label: '女'\r\n      }, {\r\n        value: '0',\r\n        label: '保密'\r\n      }],\r\n      login_rules: {\r\n        username: [\r\n          { validator: username_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        password: [\r\n          { validator: password_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ]\r\n      },\r\n      register_rules: {\r\n        username: [\r\n          { validator: check_username, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        nickname: [\r\n          { validator: check_nickname, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        gender: [\r\n          { validator: check_gender, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        password: [\r\n          { validator: check_password, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        confirmed_password: [\r\n          { validator: check_confirmed_password, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ],\r\n        email: [\r\n          { validator: check_email, trigger: 'blur' }\r\n        ]\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  methods: {\r\n    handle_select: function (key, keyPath) {\r\n      if (key === 'index') {\r\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/index' })\r\n      }\r\n      else if (key === 'course') {\r\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/course' })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    login: function () { this.login_form_visible = true },\r\n    personal_space: function () { this.$router.push({ path: ('/user/home/' + this.username) }) },\r\n    register: function () { this.register_form_visible = true },\r\n    logo_clicked: function () { this.$router.push({ path: ('/index') }) },\r\n    logout: function () {\r\n      var self = this\r\n      $.ajax({\r\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n        dataType: 'json',\r\n        url: '/sign/logout/',\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        success: function (data) {\r\n          switch (data['error']) {\r\n            case 0:\r\n              self.is_login = false\r\n              self.username = null\r\n              alert('登出成功')\r\n              self.$store.state.is_login = false\r\n              self.$store.state.user_name = ''\r\n              break\r\n            case 301:\r\n              alert('登出失败')\r\n              break\r\n            default:\r\n              alert('未知错误')\r\n          }\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n          alert('登出连接服务器失败')\r\n        }\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    login_confirm_clicked: function (form_name) { this.$refs[form_name].validate((valid) => {\r\n      if (valid) {\r\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/login/')\r\n        var post_data = {\r\n          'username': this.login_form['username'],\r\n          'password': this.login_form['password']\r\n        }\r\n        var self = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: post_data,\r\n          success: function (data) {\r\n            // data = JSON.parse(data)\r\n            // login_form_visible = false\r\n            switch (data['error']) {\r\n              case 0:\r\n                self.login_form_visible = false\r\n                // self.username = post_data['username']\r\n                self.username = data['username']\r\n                self.is_login = true\r\n                self.$store.state.user_name = self.username\r\n                self.$store.state.is_login = true\r\n                alert('登录成功')\r\n                break\r\n              case 101:\r\n                alert('登录失败：用户名不存在或密码不匹配')\r\n                break\r\n              case 102:\r\n                alert('登录失败：非法的输入')\r\n                break\r\n              default:\r\n                alert('未知错误')\r\n            }\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            alert('服务器连接异常')\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      } else {\r\n        return false\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    },\r\n    handle_close_login (done) {\r\n      this.login_form_visible = false\r\n    },\r\n    handle_close_register (done) {\r\n      this.register_form_visible = false\r\n    },\r\n    register_confirm_clicked: function (form_name) { this.$refs[form_name].validate((valid) => {\r\n      if (valid) {\r\n        var post_data = {\r\n          'username': this.register_form['username'],\r\n          'password1': this.register_form['password'],\r\n          'password2': this.register_form['confirmed_password'],\r\n          'email': this.register_form['email'],\r\n          'gender': this.register_form['gender'],\r\n          'nickname': this.register_form['nickname'],\r\n          'intro': null\r\n        }\r\n        var self = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: '/sign/register/',\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: </el-form-item>     \r\n      </el-form>  \r\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\r\n        <el-button @click=\"uploadDialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"upload\">上 传</el-button>\r\n      </span>      \r\n    </el-dialog>\r\n\r\n  <!-- 资源具体信息dialog -->\r\n  <el-dialog title=\"资源信息\" :visible.sync=\"dialogVisible\" v-if=\"dialogVisible\" size=\"small\">\r\n      <ResourceDialog></ResourceDialog>\r\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\r\n        <el-button @click=\"dialogVisible=false\">取 formData.append('file', fileObj)\r\n      formData.append('name', fileObj.name)\r\n      formData.append('only_url', false)\r\n      formData.append('url', null)\r\n      formData.append('intro', this.resourceIntro)\r\n      formData.append('course_code', this.$store.state.course_code)\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resourceUpload/')\r\n      $.ajax({\r\n        url: post_url,\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        data: formData,\r\n        async: true,\r\n        cache: false,\r\n        contentType: false,\r\n        processData: false,\r\n        success: this.$store.state.id = this.card_data[i][j].id\r\n      var resourceDialogSelf = this\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\r\n      var _this = this\r\n    self.card_data[i][pos].frequency=info[i]['download_count']\r\n          self.card_data[i][pos].id = info[i]['resource_id']\r\n          self.card_data[i][pos].show = 'visible'\r\n          var name 10px;\r\n    word-break: break-all;\r\n    word-wrap: break-word;\r\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\r\n  }\r\n  .card_text{\r\n    color: grey;\r\n  }\r\n</style>\n\n\n// WEBPACK FOOTER //\n// src/components/course/Course_info.vue","<template>\r\n  <div id='forum' class='container'>\r\n    <Header></Header>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"24\">\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" icon=\"d-arrow-left\" style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 20px\" @click=\"return_course_button_clicked\">返回课程页面\r\n        </el-button>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"24\">\r\n        <p class=\"title\">\r\n          {{ course_name }}-讨论版\r\n        </p>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"9\" :offset=\"3\">\r\n        <el-radio-group v-model=\"selected_filter\" @change=\"handle_filter_change\">\r\n          <template v-for=\"term in search_terms\">\r\n            <el-radio-button class=\"button_group_static\" :label=\"term.text\">\r\n              {{ term.text }}\r\n            </el-radio-button>\r\n          </template>\r\n        </el-radio-group>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n </el-col>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"0\">\r\n        <el-input type=\"text\" v-model = \"search_text\" placeholder=\"在当前条目下搜索\" @keydown.enter.native.prevent=\"search_button_clicked\" icon=\"search\" :on-icon-click=\"search_button_clicked\"></el-input>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <template v-for=\"thread in current_threads\">\r\n      <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" class=\"thread_container\">\r\n        <el-col :span=\"4\">\r\n          <el-row>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\r\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:#58B7FF\">{{ thread.agree_num }}</p>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\r\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:rgb(80,80,80)\">{{ thread.follow_num }}</p>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\r\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:grey\">{{ thread.read_num }}</p>\r\n class=\"thread_info_term\" style=\"color:grey\">浏览</p>\r\n            </el-col>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n        <el-col :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\r\n          <el-row style=\"padding-bottom: 10px;\">\r\n            <el-button type=\"text\" class=\"title_button\" @click=\"enter_thread_button_clicked(thread.id)\">\r\n            <p style=\"\">\r\n              <span style=\"\">{{ thread.type }} ·</span>\r\n              <span style=\"\">{{ thread.title }}</span>\r\n            </p>\r\n          </el-button>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row style=\"padding-bottom: 10px;\">\r\n            <p class=\"thread_description\"> {{ thread.description }} </p>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n          <el-row>\r\n            <p style=\"float: right;color:grey\"> {{ thread.user_name }} 最后编辑于 {{ thread.time }}</p>\r\n          </el-row>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n      </el-row>\r\n      <center><hr width=\"80%\"/></center>\r\n    </template>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\">\r\n      <el-col :span=\"18\">\r\n      <center><el-pagination layout=\"prev,pager,next\" @current-change=\"handle_current_change\" :page-size=\"page_size\" :total=\"total_threads\" :current-page.sync=\"current_page\" style=\"margin-top: 40px\"></el-pagination>\r\n      </center>\r\n    </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\r\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\r\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\r\n/* eslint-disable space-infix-ops */\r\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\r\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'Forum',\r\n  components: { Header },\r\n  beforeCreate () {\r\n    this.dev = true\r\n    this.page_size = 10\r\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/id/list/')\r\n    var post_data = { course_id: this.$route.params.course_id }\r\n    var _this = this\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      data: post_data,\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        var id_list = data['id_list']\r\n        if (id_list.length !== 0) {\r\n          _this.total_threads = id_list.length\r\n          var len = (id_list.length > _this.page_size ? _this.page_size : id_list.length)\r\n          var target_list = id_list.slice(0, len)\r\n          for (var j = 0; j < id_list.length; j++) {\r\n            _this.threads.push(id_list[j])\r\n          }\r\n          post_data = { id_list: JSON.stringify(target_list), get_content: true, get_grade: true, get_follow_count: true }\r\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/post/information/list/')\r\n          $.ajax({\r\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n            dataType: 'json',\r\n            url: post_url,\r\n            type: 'POST',\r\n            data: post_data,\r\n            success: function (data) {\r\n              var info_list = data['info_list']\r\n              for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\r\n                var type = (info_list[i].type === 1 ? '问题讨论' : (info_list[i].type === 2 ? '学习心得' : '其他'))\r\n              // need to cut description\r\n                var cut_description = (info_list[i].content.length < 100 ? info_list[i].content : info_list[i].content.substr(0, 100)) + '....'\r\n                var thread = { id: id_list[i], agree_num: info_list[i].grade_sum, follow_num: info_list[i].follow_count, read_num: info_list[i].read_count, type: type, title: info_list[i].title, description: cut_description, user_name: info_list[i].username, time: info_list[i].update_time }\r\n                _this.current_threads.push(thread)\r\n              }\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '加载帖子信息失败'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        _this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          message: '加载帖子列表失败'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    post_data = { 'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id }\r\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      data: post_data,\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        var info = data['course_info']\r\n        _this.course_name = info.name\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        _this.message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          message: '获取课程信息失败'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n  },\r\n  data () {\r\n    return {\r\n      course_name: '',\r\n      total_threads: 0,\r\n      page_size: 10,\r\n      current_page: 1,\r\n      selected_filter: '全部',\r\n      search_text: '',\r\n      current_threads: [],\r\n      threads: [],\r\n      search_terms: [\r\n        { text: '全部' },\r\n        { text: '学习心得' },\r\n        { text: '问题讨论' },\r\n        { text: '其他' }\r\n      ],\r\n      thread_terms: [ '赞同', '跟帖', '浏览' ]\r\n\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  methods: {\r\n    return_course_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/'+this.$route.params.course_id+'/' })\r\n    },\r\n    search_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      this.$message({\r\n        showClose: true,\r\n        message: '尚未开放，敬请期待'\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    handle_current_change: function (value) {\r\n      this.current_page = value\r\n      this.current_threads = []\r\n      var len = this.threads.length < value*this.page_size ? this.threads.length % this.page_size : this.page_size\r\n      var target_list = []\r\n      for (var j = 0; j < len; j++) {\r\n        target_list.push(this.threads[(value-1)*this.page_size+j])\r\n      }\r\n      var post_data = { id_list: target_list, get_content: true, get_grade: true, get_follow_count: true }\r\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/information/list/')\r\n      var _this = this\r\n      $.ajax({\r\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n        dataType: 'json',\r\n        url: post_url,\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        data: post_data,\r\n        success: function (data) {\r\n          var info_list = data['info_list']\r\n          for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\r\n            var type = (info_list[i].type === 1 ? '问题讨论' : (info_list[i].type === 2 ? '学习心得' : '其他'))\r\n              // need to cut description\r\n            var cut_description = (info_list[i].content.length < 100 ? info_list[i].content : info_list[i].content.substr(0, 100)) + '....'\r\n            var thread = { id: target_list[i], agree_num: info_list[i].grade_sum, follow_num: info_list[i].follow_count, read_num: info_list[i].read_count, type: type, title: info_list[i].title, description: cut_description, user_name: info_list[i].username, time: info_list[i].update_time }\r\n            _this.current_threads.push(thread)\r\n          }\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n          _this.$message({\r\n            showClose: true,\r\n            type: 'error',\r\n            message: '加载帖子信息失败'\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    handle_filter_change: function (value) {\r\n      // handle the filter changing of thread\r\n    },\r\n    enter_thread_button_clicked: function (value) {\r\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/forum/'+value+'/' })\r\n    },\r\n    post_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      if (this.$store.state.is_login === true) {\r\n        this.$router.push({path: '/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/forum/new'})\r\n      }\r\n      else {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          message: '请先登录再发帖',\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'warning'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n\r\n<style type=\"text/css\" scoped>\r\n  .container{\r\n    font-family: Microsoft Yahei;\r\n  }\r\n  .title{\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    font-size: 40px;\r\n    padding-bottom: 30px;\r\n  }\r\n  .button_group_static{\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n  }\r\n  .thread_info_num{\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    font-size: 24px;\r\n    padding-bottom: 10px;\r\n    padding-top: 0px;\r\n    margin-top: 0px;\r\n  }\r\n  .thread_info_term{\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    font-size: 24px;\r\n  }\r\n  .title_button{\r\n    padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;\r\n    margin: 4px 0px 0px 4px;\r\n    color:black;\r\n    font-size: 24px;\r\n    word-wrap: break-word;\r\n    word-break:break-all;\r\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\r\n  }\r\n  .title_button:hover{\r\n    color: #58B7FF;\r\n    text-decoration: underline;\r\n  }\r\n  .thread_container{\r\n    margin-top: 30px;\r\n    height: auto;\r\n  }\r\n  .thread_description{\r\n    color: grey;\r\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\r\n    word-break: break-all;\r\n    word-wrap:break-word;\r\n  }\r\n</style>\n\n\n// WEBPACK FOOTER //\n// }} :</span>\r\n            <span> {{ comment.content }}</span>\r\n          </p>\r\n        </el-col>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n        <center>\r\n          <hr width=\"60%\" </el-col>\r\n          <el-col :span=\"2\">\r\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"main_input_comment_button_clicked\">评论</el-button>\r\n          </el-col>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <!-- response -->\r\n    <el-row class=\"response_info_row\">\r\n      <p class=\"response_info\">\r\n        共 {{ response_num }} 个回答\r\n      </p>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <center>\r\n      <hr width=\"80%\" style=\"height:0px;border:none;border-top:2px solid grey; margin:10px 0px 20px 0px;\" />\r\n    </center>\r\n    <template v-for=\"(response,index) in       <el-col :span=\"16\">\r\n          <el-row class=\"info_row\">\r\n          <el-col :span=\"2\">\r\n            <img :src=\"response.avatar\" class=\"avatar\"></el-col>\r\n          <el-col       <el-col :span=\"18\" :offset=\"4\">\r\n          <p>\r\n            <span> {{ comment.user_name }} :</span>\r\n            <span> {{ comment.content }}</span>\r\n          </p>\r\n </template>\r\n      <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" class=\"comment_input\">\r\n          <el-col :span=\"12\" :offset=\"0\">\r\n        <el-input v-model=\"response.input_comment\" @click=\"load_more_responses_button_clicked\">\r\n      <p class=\"all_text\">查看全部{{response_num}}条回复</p>\r\n    </el-button>\r\n    </center>\r\n    \r\n    <!-- editor -->\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" class=\"response_info_row\" id=\"follow_row\">\r\n      <el-col :span=\"20\">\r\n        <p style=\"text-align: left; margin-bottom: 20px;\">发表你的看法</p>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" >\r\n      <el-col :span=\"20\" class=\"editor_container\">\r\n      <quill-editor v-model=\"editor.content\" ref=\"quill\" class=\"editor\" :options=\"editor.option\" @change=\"on_editor_change\">\r\n      </quill-editor>\r\n    </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" >\r\n      <el-col :span=\"20\" class=\"limit\">\r\n        <el-alert :title=\"note\" type=\"info\" :closable=\"false\" show-icon v-if=\"!editor.overflow\">\r\n        </el-alert>\r\n        <el-alert :title=\"alert\" type=\"error\" :closable=\"false\" show-icon v-if=\"editor.overflow\"> \r\n        </el-alert>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\">\r\n      <el-col :span=\"22\">\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"post_submit_button_clicked\" class=\"submit_button\" size=\"large\">\r\n          提交\r\n        </el-button>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\r\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\r\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\r\n/* eslint-disable space-infix-ops */\r\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\r\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\r\nimport default_img from '../../assets/headportrait.jpg'\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'Thread',\r\n  components: { Header },\r\n  mounted () {\r\n    // todo:load thread and course name,\r\n    this.dev = true\r\n    this.response_page_size = 10\r\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/follow/id/list/')\r\n    var post_data = { post_id: Number(this.$route.params.thread_id) }\r\n    var _this = this\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      data: post_data,\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        var main_id = Number(_this.$route.params.thread_id)\r\n        if (main_id !== -1) {\r\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/post/information/list/')\r\n          post_data = { id_list: JSON.stringify([main_id]), get_content: false, get_grade: false, get_follow_count: false }\r\n          $.ajax({\r\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n            dataType: 'json',\r\n            url: post_url,\r\n            type: 'POST',\r\n            data: post_data,\r\n            success: function (data) {\r\n              var main_info = data['info_list']\r\n              _this.main.title = main_info[0].title\r\n              var temp = main_info[0].category\r\n              _this.main.type = (temp === 1 ? '问题讨论' : (temp === 2 ? '学习心得' : '其他'))\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '获取主帖信息失败'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n        var id_list = data['id_list']\r\n        _this.response_num = id_list.length\r\n        _this.more_comment_button_style.display = (id_list.length > _this.response_page_size ? 'inline' : 'none')\r\n        for (var i = 0; i < id_list.length; i++) {\r\n          _this.responses_list.push(id_list[i])\r\n        }\r\n        var len = (id_list.length > _this.response_page_size ? _this.response_page_size : id_list.length)\r\n        var target_list = id_list.slice(0, len)\r\n        target_list.unshift(data['main_id'])\r\n        post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/follow/info/list/')\r\n        post_data = { id_list: JSON.stringify(target_list) }\r\n        if (main_id !== -1) {\r\n          $.ajax({\r\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n            dataType: 'json',\r\n            url: post_url,\r\n            type: 'POST',\r\n            data: post_data,\r\n            success: function (data) {\r\n              var info_list = data['info_list']\r\n              // load main\r\n              var pos = info_list[0].pos_eva_count\r\n              // var neg = info_list[0].neg_eva_count\r\n              _this.main.id = target_list[0]\r\n              _this.main.agree_num = pos // need to add\r\n              _this.main.user_name = info_list[0].username\r\n              _this.main.self_intro = '' // need\r\n              _this.main.avatar = default_img // need\r\n              _this.main.content = info_list[0].content\r\n              _this.main.time = String(info_list[0].edit_time)\r\n              _this.main.comment_active.display = 'none'\r\n              _this.main.input_comment = ''\r\n              for (var j = 1; j < info_list.length; j++) {\r\n                var temp = {}\r\n                pos = info_list[j].pos_eva_count\r\n                // neg = info_list[j].neg_eva_count\r\n                temp.id = target_list[j]\r\n                temp.agree_num = pos // need\r\n                temp.user_name = info_list[j].username\r\n                temp.self_intro = '' // need\r\n                temp.avatar = default_img // need\r\n                temp.content = info_list[j].content\r\n                temp.time = String(info_list[j].edit_time)\r\n                temp.comment_active = {}\r\n                temp.comment_active.display = 'none'\r\n                temp.input_comment = ''\r\n                _this.responses.push(temp)\r\n              }\r\n              _this.get_comments_of_follow(_this.main)\r\n              for (var i = 0; i < _this.responses.length; i++) {\r\n                _this.get_comments_of_follow(_this.responses[i])\r\n              }\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '加载帖子信息失败'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          _this.$message({\r\n            showClose: true,\r\n            type: 'error',\r\n            message: '帖子不存在，大兄弟不要乱输域名'\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        _this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          message: '加载帖子列表失败'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    post_data = { 'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id }\r\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n        dataType: 'json',\r\n        url: post_url,\r\n        type: 'POST',\r\n        data: post_data,\r\n        success: function (data) {\r\n          var comment_list = data['id_list']\r\n          if (comment_list.length > 0) {\r\n            comment_list.reverse() // from old to new\r\n            post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/comment/info/list/')\r\n            post_data = { id_list: JSON.stringify(comment_list) }\r\n            $.ajax({\r\n              ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n              dataType: 'json',\r\n              url: post_url,\r\n              type: 'POST',\r\n              data: post_data,\r\n              success: function (data) {\r\n                var info_list = data['info_list']\r\n                // follow.comment_num = info_list.length\r\n                _this.$set(follow, 'comment_num', info_list.length)\r\n                follow.comments = []\r\n                for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\r\n                  var temp = {}\r\n                  temp.user_name = info_list[i].username\r\n                  temp.content = info_list[i].content\r\n                  follow.comments.push(temp)\r\n                }\r\n              },\r\n              error: function () {\r\n                _this.$message({\r\n                  showClose: true,\r\n                  type: 'error',\r\n                  message: '获取评论信息失败'\r\n                })\r\n              }\r\n            })\r\n          } else {\r\n            _this.$set(follow, 'comment_num', 0)\r\n          }\r\n        },\r\n        error: function () {\r\n          _this.$message({\r\n            showClose: true,\r\n            type: 'error',\r\n            message: '获取评论列表失败'\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    return_forum_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/'+this.$route.params.course_id+'/forum/' })\r\n    },\r\n    agree_button_clicked: function (is_main, value, id, index) {\r\n      if (!this.$store.state.is_login) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          message: '请先登录'\r\n        })\r\n      } else {\r\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/follow/evaluate/')\r\n        var post_data = { follow_id: id, grade: value }\r\n        var _this = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: post_data,\r\n          success: function (data) {\r\n            var code = Number(data['error'])\r\n            if (code === 0) {\r\n              var target = (is_main ? _this.main : _this.responses[index])\r\n              target.agree_num += value\r\n            } else if (code === 1) {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '已经评价过了呢'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            _this.$message({\r\n              showClose: true,\r\n              type: 'error',\r\n              message: '无法连接到服务器'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    main_comment_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      var temp = (this.main.comment_active.display === 'none' ? 'inline' : 'none')\r\n      this.$set(this.main.comment_active, 'display', temp)\r\n    },\r\n    main_input_comment_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      var target_content = this.main.input_comment\r\n      if (!this.$store.state.is_login) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          message: '请先登录再评论'\r\n        })\r\n      } else if (target_content === '') {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '评论内容不能为空！',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n      else {\r\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/comment/publish/')\r\n        var post_data = { follow_id: this.main.id, to_comment_id: -1, content: target_content }\r\n        var _this = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: post_data,\r\n          success: function (data) {\r\n            var code = Number(data['error'])\r\n            if (code === 0) {\r\n              _this.$router.go(0)\r\n            } else if (code === 1) {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '评论失败'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            _this.$message({\r\n              showClose: true,\r\n              type: 'error',\r\n              message: '无法连接到服务器'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    response_comment_button_clicked: function (index) {\r\n      var temp = (this.responses[index].comment_active.display==='none' ? 'inline' : 'none')\r\n      this.$set(this.responses[index].comment_active, 'display', temp)\r\n    },\r\n    response_input_comment_button_clicked: function (index) {\r\n      var target_content =        })\r\n      } else if (target_content === '') {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '评论内容不能为空！',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n      else {\r\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/comment/publish/')\r\n        var post_data = { follow_id: this.responses[index].id, to_comment_id: -1, content: target_content }\r\n        var _this = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n         message: '无法连接到服务器'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    edit_comment_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      document.getElementById('follow_row').scrollIntoView()\r\n    },\r\n    load_more_responses_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      var len = (this.response_num - this.response_page_size > 0 ? this.response_num - this.response_page_size : 0)\r\n      if (len > 0) {\r\n        var target_list = this.responses_list.slice(this.response_page_size, this.response_page_size + len)\r\n        var (data) {\r\n            var info_list = data['info_list']\r\n            for (var j = 0; j < info_list.length; j++) {\r\n              var temp = {}\r\n              temp.id = target_list[j]\r\n error: function () {\r\n            _this.$message({\r\n              showClose: true,\r\n              type: 'error',\r\n              message: '加载全部帖子信息失败'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    on_editor_change: function ({editor, html, text}) {\r\n      this.editor.current_text_length = text.length\r\n      this.editor.overflow = (text.length > this.editor.text_limit)\r\n      this.editor.current_available_text = ((this.editor.text_limit - text.length) < 0 ? 0 : (this.editor.text_limit - text.length))\r\n      this.editor.text = text.substr(0, 100)\r\n    },\r\n    post_submit_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      if (this.editor.overflow || this.editor.text.length < 10) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '请先登录再评论',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      } else {\r\n        this.$confirm('确认发布评论？', '发布', {\r\n          confirmButtonText: '发布',\r\n          cancelButtonText: '取消',\r\n          type: 'info'\r\n        }).then(() => {\r\n          var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/follow/publish/')\r\n          var post_data = { post_id: '发布成功'\r\n                })\r\n                _this.$router.go(0)\r\n              } else if (code === 1) {\r\n                _this.$message({\r\n                  showClose: true,\r\n                  type: 'error',\r\n                  message: '发布评论失败'\r\n                })\r\n              }\r\n            },\r\n            error: function () {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n   \r\n  </el-col>\r\n  <el-dialog title=\"修改个人信息\" :visible.sync=\"dialog_visible\">\r\n    <el-form :model=\"form\" label-position=\"top\" ref=\"form\" :rules=\"form_rules\">\r\n      <el-form-item  </el-form-item>\r\n        <el-form-item type=\"select\" label=\"性别\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\" >\r\n        <el-select v-model=\"form.gender\" placeholder=\"请选择性别\">\r\n          <el-option v-for=\"item in gender_options\" :key=\"item.value\" :label=\"item.label\" :value=\"item.value\"></el-option>\r\n        </el-select>\r\n      </el-form-item>\r\n      <el-form-item type=\"select\" :label=\"item.label\" :value=\"item.value\"></el-option>\r\n        </el-select>\r\n      </el-form-item>\r\n      <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"个人介绍\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\" prop=\"intro\">\r\n        <el-input v-model=\"form.intro\" auto-complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"一句话自我介绍，50字以内\"></el-input>\r\n      </el-form-item>\r\n      \r\n    </el-form>\r\n    <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"edit_confirm_clicked('form')\">确 定</el-button>\r\n        <el-button @click.native=\"dialog_visible=false\">取 消</el-button>\r\n      </span>\r\n    </el-dialog>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n\r\n<script>\r\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\r\n/* eslint-disable var check_nickname = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        var l = value.length\r\n        var rl = 0\r\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\r\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\r\n            rl++\r\n          }\r\n          rl++\r\n        }\r\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n    var check_intro = (rule, value, callback) => {\r\n      setTimeout(() => {\r\n        var l = value.length\r\n        var rl = 0\r\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\r\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\r\n            rl++\r\n          }\r\n          rl++\r\n        }\r\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 50) {\r\n          callback()\r\n        }\r\n        else {\r\n          callback(new Error('自我介绍长度必须在50位及以下'))\r\n        }\r\n      }, 500)\r\n    }\r\n\r\n fans: 0,\r\n      personalIntro: '',\r\n      tableData: [\r\n        {\r\n          course: '敬请期待',\r\n          points: ''\r\n        }\r\n      ],\r\n      headPortrait: hp,\r\n '/user/modify/info/')\r\n        var post_data = { nickname: this.form.nickname, gender: this.form.gender, intro: this.form.intro, college_id: this.form.college_id }\r\n        var _this = this\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n          dataType: 'json',\r\n          url: post_url,\r\n          type: 'POST',\r\n          data: post_data,\r\n          success: function (data) {\r\n            var code = data['error']\r\n            if (code === 0) {\r\n              _this.dialog_visible = false\r\n              _this.$router.go(0)\r\n            } else if (code === 1) {\r\n              _this.$message({\r\n                showClose: true,\r\n                type: 'error',\r\n                message: '数据格式错误'\r\n              })\r\n            }\r\n          },\r\n          error: function () {\r\n            _this.$message({\r\n              showClose: true,\r\n              type: 'error',\r\n              message: '修改个人信息失败'\r\n            })\r\n          }\r\n        })\r\n      })\r\n    },\r\n    edit_info_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      this.dialog_visible = !this.dialog_visible\r\n    },\r\n    handle_select: function (key, key_path) {\r\n      if (key === 'index') {\r\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/index' })\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  created: function () {\r\n    var personalSelf = this\r\n    var post_url 'POST',\r\n      async: false,\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        personalSelf.username = data['username']\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('加载导航栏连接服务器失败')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n    this.username = this.$route.params.username\r\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json;
