personalSelf.username = data['user_info']['username']\r\n        personalSelf.nickname = data['user_info']['nickname']\r\n        personalSelf.form.nickname = data['user_info']['nickname']\r\n        personalSelf.form.gender = data['user_info']['gender']\r\n        if (data['user_info']['gender'] === '1') {\r\n          personalSelf.gender = '男'\r\n        } else if (data['user_info']['gender'] === '2') {\r\n          personalSelf.gender = '女'\r\n        } else if (data['user_info']['gender'] === '0') {\r\n          personalSelf.gender = '保密'\r\n        } else {\r\n          personalSelf.gender = ''\r\n        }\r\n        personalSelf.form.intro = data['user_info']['intro']\r\n        personalSelf.personalIntro = data['user_info']['intro']\r\n        personalSelf.college = data['user_info']['college_id']\r\n        personalSelf.form.college_id = data['user_info']['college_id']\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        alert('fail')\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n\r\n<style scpoed>\r\n  .header{\r\n    height: 60px;\r\n    line-height: 60px;\r\n    background: #20a0ff;\r\n    color:#fff;\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    font-size: .el-col {\r\n    border-radius: 0px;\r\n  }\r\n  #headPortrait {\r\n    height: 200px;\r\n    font-size: 20px;\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    line-height: 200px;\r\n  }\r\n  #tableTitle {\r\n </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"24\">\r\n        <p class=\"title\">\r\n          {{ course_name }}-讨论板\r\n        </p>\r\n        <p class=\"title\">\r\n          发表新贴\r\n        </p>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"2\">\r\n      <p class=\"label\">\r\n        选择帖子的类型:\r\n      </p>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"18\">\r\n        <el-radio-group v-model=\"category\" style=\"padding-top: 10px\">\r\n          <el-radio :label=\"1\">问题讨论</el-radio>\r\n          <el-radio :label=\"2\">学习心得</el-radio>\r\n          <el-radio :label=\"0\">其他</el-radio>\r\n        </el-radio-group>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"2\">\r\n      <p class=\"label\">\r\n        标题\r\n      </p>\r\n    </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row tpye='flex' justify=\"center\">\r\n      <el-col :span=\"20\" class=\"input\" :offset=\"2\">\r\n        <el-input v-model=\"title\" placeholder=\"输入标题,4-40个字符\">\r\n        </el-input>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row>\r\n      <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"2\">\r\n      <p class=\"label\">\r\n        正文\r\n      </p>\r\n    </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" >\r\n      <el-col :span=\"20\" class=\"editor_container\">\r\n      <quill-editor v-model=\"editor.content\" ref=\"quill\" class=\"editor\" :options=\"editor.option\" @change=\"on_editor_change($event)\">\r\n      </quill-editor>\r\n    </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" >\r\n          <el-col :span=\"20\" class=\"limit\">\r\n            <el-alert :title=\"note\" type=\"info\" :closable=\"false\" show-icon v-if=\"!overflow\">\r\n            </el-alert>\r\n            <el-alert :title=\"alert\" type=\"error\" :closable=\"false\" show-icon v-if=\"overflow\">\r\n            </el-alert>\r\n          </el-col>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n        <!--\r\n        <el-row type=\"flex\"justify=\"center\" style=\"padding-bottom: 20px;\">\r\n          <el-col :span=\"20\">\r\n            <el-alert title=\"请注意，超过帖子长度限制的文本会被截断。\" type=\"info\" close-text=\"了解了\" show-icon>\r\n            </el-alert>\r\n          </el-col>\r\n        </el-row>\r\n      -->\r\n        <el-row type=\"flex\">\r\n      <el-col :span=\"22\">\r\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"post_submit_button_clicked\" class=\"submit_button\" size=\"large\">\r\n          提交\r\n        </el-button>\r\n      </el-col>\r\n    </el-row>\r\n  </div>\r\n</template>\r\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\r\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\r\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\r\n/* eslint-disable space-infix-ops */\r\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\r\nimport $ from 'jquery'\r\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\r\nexport default {\r\n  name: 'Editor',\r\n  components: { Header },\r\n  data () {\r\n    return {\r\n      editor: {\r\n        content: '',\r\n        option: { placeholder: '帖子的正文' }\r\n      },\r\n      title: '',\r\n      category: -1,\r\n      text_limit: 10000,\r\n      current_available_text: 10000,\r\n      current_text_length: 0,\r\n      dev: true,\r\n      loading: false,\r\n      overflow: false,\r\n      loading_text: '发布成功，正在跳转',\r\n      course_name: ''\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  methods: {\r\n    post_submit_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      if (!this.$store.state.is_login) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '请先登录',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      } else if (this.title.length > 40 || this.title.length < 4) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '请控制标题的长度在4-40个字符以内',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      } else if (this.overflow) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '正文长度最多为'+this.text_limit,\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      } else if (this.category === -1) {\r\n        this.$message({\r\n          showClose: true,\r\n          message: '必须选择帖子的类型',\r\n          type: 'error'\r\n        })\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (this.category === 2 && this.current_text_length < 100) {\r\n          this.message({\r\n            showClose: true,\r\n            message: '学习心得的正文长度需要大于100',\r\n            type: 'error'\r\n          })\r\n        } else {\r\n          this.$confirm('确认发布帖子吗？', '发布', {\r\n            confirmButtonText: '发布',\r\n            cancelButtonText: '取消',\r\n            type: 'info'\r\n          }).then(() => {\r\n            var content = this.editor.content\r\n            var post_data = { title: this.title, course_id: this.$route.params.course_id, category: this.category, content: content, editor: 0 }\r\n            var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/posting/publish/')\r\n            var _this = this\r\n            $.ajax({\r\n              ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n              dataType: 'json',\r\n              url: post_url,\r\n              type: 'POST',\r\n              data: post_data,\r\n              success: function (data) {\r\n                var code = Number(data['error'])\r\n                if (code === 0) {\r\n                  console.log('success')\r\n                  _this.loading = true\r\n                  _this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/' + _this.$route.params.course_id + '/forum' })\r\n                } else if (code === 1) {\r\n                  _this.$message({\r\n                    showClose: true,\r\n                    type: 'error',\r\n                    message: '发布失败'\r\n                  })\r\n                }\r\n              },\r\n              error: function () {\r\n                _this.$message({\r\n                  showClose: true,\r\n                  type: 'error',\r\n                  message: '无法链接到服务器'\r\n                })\r\n              }\r\n            })\r\n          })\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n    },\r\n    on_editor_change: function ({ editor, html, text }) {\r\n      this.current_text_length = text.length\r\n      this.overflow = (text.length > this.text_limit)\r\n      this.current_available_text = ((this.text_limit - text.length) < 0 ? 0 : (this.text_limit - text.length))\r\n    },\r\n    return_forum_button_clicked: function () {\r\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/forum' })\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  computed: {\r\n    note: function () {\r\n      return '已经输入'+this.current_text_length+'个字符，还可以输入'+this.current_available_text+'个字符'\r\n    },\r\n    alert: function () {\r\n      return '文章长度超出限制了呢，目前已经输入了:'+this.current_text_length+'个字符,超出了:'+(this.current_text_length-this.text_limit)+'个字符'\r\n    }\r\n  },\r\n  mounted () {\r\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\r\n    var post_data = { course_id: this.$route.params.course_id }\r\n    var _this = this\r\n    $.ajax({\r\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\r\n      dataType: 'json',\r\n      url: post_url,\r\n      type: 'POST',\r\n      data: post_data,\r\n      success: function (data) {\r\n        var info = data['course_info']\r\n        _this.course_name = info.name\r\n      },\r\n      error: function () {\r\n        _this.$notify({\r\n          type: 'error',\r\n          title: '错误',\r\n          message: '获取课程信息失败'\r\n        })\r\n      }\r\n    })\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n\r\n<style type=\"text/css\" scoped>\r\n  .title{\r\n    text-align: center;\r\n    font-size: 40px;\r\n
